rules_text:
Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. Create a 1/1 green Spirit Snake creature token with deathtouch.
You may sacrifice a Spirit. When you do, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
Exile target nonland permanent until Rain Zai, Spiritscale leaves the battlefield. You gain 2 life.
special_text:
[+1]: Mill two cards. Create a 1/1 green Spirit Snake creature token.
[0]: You may sacrifice a Spirit. When you do, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
[-2]: Exile another target nonland permanent until Rain Zai leaves the battlefield. You gain 2 life.
